metadata.title: CVE-2021-3532 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible where the secret information present in async_files are getting disclosed when the user changes the jobdir to a world readable directory. Any secret information in an async status file will be readable by a malicious user on that system. This flaw affects Ansible Tower 3.7 and Ansible Automation Platform 1.2.

notes.note: sbeattie> no apparent upstream fix as of 2022-01-14

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-14').
ansible-base package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
